title: Novo Nordisk to slash GLP-1 list prices by up to 50% in U.S. to cut costs for insured patients
summary_full: The cuts aim to make the drugs more accessible to insured patients, particularly people with high-deductible health plans or coinsurance benefit designs.
summary_public: The cuts aim to make the drugs more accessible to insured patients, particularly people with high-deductible health plans or coinsurance benefit designs.
